name: Descend the Pyramid (#GM20 Jam)
description:
This game was made for GameMaker's 20th anniversary game jam. 

The theme being "20", I created a runner who must descend a pyramid in maximum 20 seconds.

And as an illustrious person would have said: "From the top of this pyramid, 20 years contemplates you"... (ok, maybe a little more).
Also make the best score: 20/20 and beat the distance record... 

What GameMaker has been doing for 20 years.

Good job YoYo!

----- Controls:
  • Move = "Arrows keys" 
  • Begin = "Spacebar"
  • Restart = "R"
  • And different buttons on the screen: Option - Volume - Reset record - Restart

-----

Attention:

Touch the line once = 1 second lost

Good luck!
